    • loadLanguage

      public static ResourceBundle loadLanguage(String localeStr, String path, String file) throws MalformedURLException, FileNotFoundException
      Method to load language files.
      Parameter:
      localeStr - Language code
      path - Path to language file folder
      file - Language file name
      Gibt zurück:
      ResourceBundle
      Löst aus:
      MalformedURLException - error for malformed URL
      FileNotFoundException - error for non-existing file
